mapper.select: select round(avg(rating), 1) from review where spaceid = #{spaceId}
select * from reply where spaceid = #{spaceId} order by replydate desc
select * from review where spaceid = #{spaceId} order by reviewdate desc
select * from qna where spaceid = #{spaceId} order by qnadate desc
select * from images where spaceid = #{spaceId} order by imagesid desc
select seq_space.nextval as spaceid from dual
mapper.insert: insert into space(spaceid, companyid, spacename, info, moreinfo, type , location, price , phone_number) values(#{spaceId},#{companyId},#{spaceName}, #{info}, #{moreInfo},#{type},#{location},#{price},#{phone_number})
mapper.select: select * from space s join (select min(imagesid) as "IMAGEID", min(spaceid) as "SPACEID", min(imgname) as "IMGNAME" from images group by spaceid) i on s.spaceid = i.spaceid where rownum <= 5 order by s.spaceid desc

select * from (select s.spaceid as "SPACEID", s.info, s.moreinfo, s.companyid, s.spacename, s.type, s.location, s.price, s.phone_number from space s left join (select spaceid as "SPACEID" from review group by spaceid order by avg(rating) desc) r on s.spaceid = r.spaceid where r.spaceid is not null and rownum <= 5) l join (select min(imagesid) as "IMAGEID", min(spaceid) as "SPACEID", min(imgname) as "IMGNAME" from images group by spaceid) k on l.spaceid = k.spaceid
